name: react-custom-hooks
description: A collection of custom React hooks.

scripts.test:react-16: cd tests/react-16-test && npm install && npm test
scripts.test:react-17: cd tests/react-17-test && npm install && npm test
scripts.test:react-18: cd tests/react-18-test && npm install && npm test
scripts.test-all: npm run test:react-16 && npm run test:react-17 && npm run test:react-18

author: Bane Grozdanovic <banegrozdanovic@gmail.com>
